00043 class tracking_goertzel_processor : public processor::base_iq {
00044 public:
00045   typedef boost::shared_ptr<tracking_goertzel_processor> sptr;
00046 
00048   class result : public processor::result_base {
00049   public:
00050     typedef boost::shared_ptr<result> sptr;
00051 
00052     virtual ~result() {}
00053     static sptr make(std::string name,
00054                      ptime       t,
00055                      double      f0_Hz,
00056                      std::string state,
00057                      double      period_sec,
00058                      const detail::value_and_error& f_Hz,
00059                      const detail::value_and_error& df) {
00060       return sptr(new result(name, t, f0_Hz, state, period_sec, f_Hz, df));
00061     }
00062     
00063     double      f0_Hz()      const { return f0_Hz_; }      
00064     std::string state()      const { return state_; }      
00065     double      period_sec() const { return period_sec_; } 
00066     const detail::value_and_error& f_Hz() const { return f_Hz_; } 
00067     const detail::value_and_error& df()   const { return df_; }   
00068 
00069     virtual std::ostream& dump_header(std::ostream& os) const {
00070       return os
00071         << "# f0[Hz] = " << boost::format("%15.6f") % f0_Hz() << "\n"
00072         << "# Time_UTC DeltaF[Hz] RMS(DeltaF)[Hz] DeltaFDot RMS(DeltaFDot) period[s] state ";
00073     }
00074     virtual std::ostream& dump_data(std::ostream& os) const {
00075       return os
00076         << boost::format("%10.6f") % f_Hz().value()     << " "
00077         << boost::format("%10.6f") % f_Hz().rms_value() << " "
00078         << boost::format("%9.2e")  % df().value()       << " "
00079         << boost::format("%9.2e")  % df().rms_value()   << " "
00080         << boost::format("%8.3f")  % period_sec()       << " "
00081         << state();
00082     }
00083 
00084   protected:
00085   private:
00086     result(std::string name,
00087            ptime t,
00088            double f0_Hz,
00089            std::string state,
00090            double period_sec,
00091            const detail::value_and_error& f_Hz,
00092            const detail::value_and_error& df)
00093       : result_base(name, t)
00094       , f0_Hz_(f0_Hz)
00095       , state_(state)
00096       , period_sec_(period_sec)
00097       , f_Hz_(f_Hz)
00098       , df_(df) {}
00099 
00100     const double f0_Hz_;      
00101     const std::string state_; 
00102     const double period_sec_; 
00103     const detail::value_and_error f_Hz_; 
00104     const detail::value_and_error df_;   
00105   } ;
00106 
00107   typedef boost::posix_time::time_duration time_duration;
00108 
00109   tracking_goertzel_processor(const boost::property_tree::ptree& config)
00110     : base_iq(config)
00111     , name_(config.get<std::string>("<xmlattr>.name"))
00112     , f0_Hz_(config.get<double>("<xmlattr>.f0_Hz"))
00113     , df_Hz_(config.get<double>("<xmlattr>.df_Hz"))
00114     , min_df_Hz_(config.get<double>("<xmlattr>.minDf_Hz"))
00115     , max_history_size_(config.get<size_t>("<xmlattr>.maxHistorySize"))
00116     , max_num_without_lock_(config.get<size_t>("<xmlattr>.maxNumWithoutLock")) {}
00117   
00118   ~tracking_goertzel_processor() {}
00119 
00120   void process_iq(service::sptr sp,
00121                   const_iterator i0,
00122                   const_iterator i1) {
00123 #if 0
00124     std::cout << "process_iq nS=" << std::distance(i0, i1)
00125               << " " << sp->id()
00126               << " " << sp->approx_ptime()
00127               << " " << sp->sample_rate_Hz()
00128               << " " << sp->center_frequency_Hz()
00129               << " " << sp->offset_ppb()
00130               << " " << sp->offset_ppb_rms()
00131               << " length=" << int(std::distance(i0, i1))
00132               << std::endl;
00133 #endif
00134     // set up a new filter
00135     const bool update_filter(filter_ ? (filter_->fs_Hz() != sp->sample_rate_Hz()) : true);
00136     if (update_filter)
00137       filter_ = tracking_goertzel_filter::make(sp->sample_rate_Hz(),
00138                                                f0_Hz_-sp->center_frequency_Hz(),
00139                                                df_Hz_,
00140                                                min_df_Hz_,
00141                                                max_history_size_,
00142                                                max_num_without_lock_);
00143     for (const_iterator i(i0); i!=i1; ++i) {
00144       filter_->update(*i);
00145       if (filter_->state_updated()) {
00146         const time_duration 
00147           dt(0,0,0, int64_t(time_duration::ticks_per_second()*(std::distance(i0, i)/sp->sample_rate_Hz() + filter_->delta_time_sec())));
00148         sp->put_result(result::make(name_,
00149                                     sp->approx_ptime()+dt,
00150                                     f0_Hz_,
00151                                     tracking_goertzel_filter::state2str(filter_->last_state()),
00152                                     double(filter_->period())/double(sp->sample_rate_Hz()),
00153                                     filter_->estimated_f_Hz(),
00154                                     filter_->estimated_df()));
00155       }
00156     }
00157   }
00158 
00159 protected:
00160 private:
00161   const std::string name_;
00162   const double      f0_Hz_;                 
00163   const double      df_Hz_;                 
00164   const double      min_df_Hz_;             
00165   const size_t      max_history_size_;      
00166   const size_t      max_num_without_lock_;  
00167   tracking_goertzel_filter::sptr filter_;
00168 } ;
